_brief: 本牌堆使用CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0进行分享。文本来源为Rockpool Publishing所出版的Making Magick迷你牌堆，原作者为Priestess Moon，翻译者为阿舟、暮星、牧羊、云陌等几位群友。于言诺整理成为牌堆。如确实感兴趣，请搜索出版社名称自行支持原版。
魔法施展:
Fire 火
The element of fire heralds new life, renewed passion and positive transformation.
火的元素预示着新的生命，新的激情和积极的转变。

Triple Moon 三相月
Embracing all aspects of your self: the divine and the earthly.
拥抱你自己的所有方面：神圣的和世俗的。

Labyrinth 迷宫
Transition to a higher level of being, raising your energetic vibration; enlightenment.
过渡到一个更高的存在层次，提升你的能量振动；启迪。

The Festival 筵宴
Creates an energetic blueprint for a fantastic party or event.
为一个精彩的聚会或活动创造一个充满活力的蓝图。

Little Luxuries 简奢
Generates luxurious experiences and surroundings.
创造豪华的体验和环境。

One Enchanted Evening 一夜情
The perfect night.
完美一夜。

Achievement 成就
Win the award, accolade or contract.
赢得嘉奖，荣誉或契约。

On Target 一往无前
Follow your ideal life path.
沿着自己理想的人生道路前进。

Time to Shine 闪耀之时
Creates the energetic resonance for golden opportunities.
为黄金机遇创造能量共振。

Perseverance 毅力
The motivation to keep going despite the odds.
不畏艰险，继续前进的动力。

Insight 洞察
Open the third eye to strengthen intuition.
开启第三只眼强化直觉。

Felix Felicitous 幸运
Power symbol to create lucky, serendipitous events.
创造幸运、偶然事件的强力符号。

Dragonfly 蜻蜓
You bring light to this world.
你给世界带来了光。

Awen: Three Rays of Light 启示：三光
Balancing male and female energies; peace and harmony.
平衡阴阳能量；平静而和谐。

Faery Magick 精灵魔法
Respectfully work with the faeries and elementals to achieve your goals.
恭敬地与精灵和元素合作，实现你的目标。

Earth 地
Ask the element of Earth for grounding, stability and strength in times of chaos.
当身陷混沌之时，向土元素寻求基础，稳固与力量。

Air 风
Work with the element of air to cut through to the core of a situation and see the truth.
借助风元素，直击事件的本质，看见真相。

Water 水
Work with the element of water for healing, purification and refinement.
借助水元素，疗愈、净化并改进。

Spirit 精神
Heavenly assistance from your angels and guides.
天使和指引者的帮助将自天上而来。

The Elements 元素
The elements of fire, air, earth and water combine to create powerful, protective boundaries: spiritual, mental, physical and emotional.
结合土水风火四元素，创造出强大的保护结界：精神上，心灵上以及情感上的保护。

Sun 太阳
The golden energy of the sun brings fame and fortune.
太阳的金色能量带来名誉和财富。

Star 星星
The silver energy of the star brings good luck and serendipity.
星星的银色能量带来好运和意外发现。

Philosopher's Stone 贤者之石
Powerful manifestation of wishes and goals by harnessing universal energy.
强大的愿望和目标的体现，利用全世界的能量。

Abracadabra with wings 会飞的咒语
Fantastic good fortune and lucky chances.
神奇的好运和幸运的机会。

Goddess 女神
Healing feminine energy.
疗愈女性能量。

Safe and happy travel 安乐
Protection from harm when journeying.
旅行时远离伤害，受到保护。

Trinka Five 财富
Manifesting money and income.
获得金钱和收入。

Power Symbol 权利的象征
Cleanse, purify and protect the physical body.
清洗、净化和保护身体。

Triple Spiral 三重螺旋
Listening to divine wisdom and joyfully learning life's lessons.
聆听神圣的智慧，快乐地学习人生的功课。

Wishes Come True 愿望成真
Rapid achievement of your dreams and wishes.
梦想和愿望快速实现。

Tree of Life 生命之树
True wisdom and making good choices in life.
真正的智慧和在生活中做出正确之选。

Happy Love 幸福之爱
A joyful, stable partnership and good friends.
一段幸福的联姻，伴随着亲密的伴侣和珍贵的友情。

Protection 保护
Strong protective magick for the family and the home.
保护家人和房子的强大保护性魔法。

Prosperity 繁荣
A prosperous business, with riches and success.
兴隆事业，财富与胜利相随。

Healing 疗愈
True healing of the mind, body and soul.
心灵，身体，精神上的真正疗愈。

Self-confidence 自信
Strong self-belief and a sense of worth.
坚定自信，自我价值的体悟。

Breaking Bad Habits 戒律
Self-acceptance, excellent mental health and letting go of vices.
自我认可，内心的和谐，放下不善之举。

Successful Career 事业蓬勃
A happy working environment: pay rises and promotions.
工作环境愉悦，财富增加与职位提升。

Love Charm 爱情魔符
Attract a lover, soul mate or life partner.
吸引爱人、灵魂伴侣或生命伴侣。

Mystic Star 神秘之星
Harmony in the home and great friendships.
家庭和谐，友谊深厚。
